short_summary: Redevelopment of the Canadian High Commission located in Canberra, Australia.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title
 Architecural Services for the Canadian High Commission in Canberra
### Reference Number
 WS3916841148-Doc3920658144
### Publication Date
 March 16, 2023
### Closing Date and Time
 April 20, 2023 at 14:00:00 EST

### Notice Information
This Government of Canada Tender Invitation to Qualify is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (GAC).

### Project Description
The redevelopment of the Canadian High Commission in Canberra, Australia, is the subject of this invitation to tender. Successful contractors will be responsible for providing architectural services in design and construction.

### Tender Requirements
 Bid submissions must be submitted electronically through SAP Ariba. Suppliers must be registered with the Government of Canada's procurement platform to access and download the Request for Qualifications (RFQ) and all attachments.

### Contact Information
 Marc Lanthier, PSPC, can be reached at marc.lanthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any inquiries.

### Trade Agreements and Preferential Procurement
 Contractors may be able to claim preferential treatment under various trade agreements, including CPTPP, Canada-UK TCA, and Canada-Colombia FTA.

### Notice URL
 This tender document can be accessed through the SAP Ariba platform.

### Key Dates
 *Amendment Date:* April 11, 2023
 *Expected Contract Start Date:* June 1, 2023
 *Expected Contract End Date:* March 31, 2026
 *Procurement Method:* Competitive

### Conclusion
The redevelopment of the Canadian High Commission in Canberra requires the expertise of experienced construction professionals offering architectural services. The tender process involves a electronic bid submission process with SAP Ariba. Bidders are required to meet the technical and financial qualifications outlined in the RFQ. Respondents must familiarize themselves with the bidding process on the Ariba platform.
